metadata.title: Tuesday, 25th October, 2022
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to expand the mortuary capacity at Mkushi District Hospital;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) what the estimated time frame for the completion of the project is; and
(d) if there are no such plans, why.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to procure ambulances for the following health facilities in Gwembe District:
(i) Gwembe District Hospital; (ii) Munyumbwe Level 1 Hospital; and (iii) Chabbobboma Mission Health Centre;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) what the cost of each ambulance is.
